trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ever a sight for sore eyes! What brings you here this day? Are you come to see our progress, or perhaps to contribute to it?

TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_001<tab>In any case, I owe you a debt of gratitude. Thanks to able and willing helpers such as your good self, the reconstruction effort proceeds apace. This court has fairly been reborn, I believe you will agree.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_002<tab>Oi, Francel. I've finished my checks, and everything looks to be order. That's that for the court, I reckon.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_003<tab>Glad am I to hear it. This is a momentous step in our project─one we could not have taken without the aid of Ishgardians and outsiders alike.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_004<tab>Aye. At last, we've got a flow of materials comin' in, along with the hands to put it all to use. It begins in earnest.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_005<tab>That it does, my friend. That it does.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Augebert. There is something I would ask of you.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_007<tab>I bid you commit to your mind's eye the Firmament as it is now.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_008<tab>When the last paving stone is laid, I would have you fully appreciate how much has been accomplished by the sweat of innumerable brows.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_009<tab>For though Ishgard may arrive at a brighter future, we must never forget the path we walked to get there, fraught with sorrow and sacrifice as it was.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_010<tab>If we do so, I fear we will lose our way again.

TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_011<tab>Heh, same old Francel, though, eh? Try to unclench that jaw of yours a little, lad, else you're liable to give yourself a fever and collapse like you used to.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_012<tab>Those days are long past, thank you very much!
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_013<tab><sigh> Just...remember what I asked. And pray keep it private. 'Tis a personal request to the two of you.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_AUGEBERT_000_014<tab>Don't worry, you know I ain't no gossipmonger. Now then, if there's nothing else, I'll get back to it.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_015<tab>All right, my friend. Take care you do not overwork yourself, and tell the others the same.

TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_016<tab>Well, there you have it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. There will be a brief hiatus while we prepare for the next phase of construction. When all is in readiness, I shall make another announcement.
TEXT_LUCKHA002_03760_FRANCEL_000_017<tab>In the meantime, do rest and recover your strength. 'Twas good to see you again.
